thread.title: Bills' LeSean McCoy set to return; Tyrod Taylor questionable
thread.title_full: Bills' LeSean McCoy set to return; Tyrod Taylor questionable

author: Stunning details in Lamar Odom brothel incident
title: Bills' LeSean McCoy set to return; Tyrod Taylor questionable
text:
Bills' LeSean McCoy set to return; Tyrod Taylor questionable Associated Press 1 hr ago Â© (AP Photo/Lynne Sladky Buffalo Bills running back LeSean McCoy (25) walks the sidelines during the first half of an NFL football game against the Miami Dolphins, Sunday, Sept. 27, 2015 in Miami Gardens, Fla. (AP Photo/Lynne Sladky) ORCHARD PARK, N.Y. (AP) Buffalo Bills running back LeSean McCoy expects to return from a hamstring injury and play Sunday against the Cincinnati Bengals.
AdChoices McCoy has missed each of the past two weeks after a setback at practice. He is listed as probable.
The status for two other top playmakers is unclear. Quarterback Tyrod Taylor and receiver Sammy Watkins are questionable.
Taylor was limited at practice for a third straight day Friday. The quarterback sprained a knee ligament in Sunday's 14-13 win over Tennessee. If Taylor is unable to play, EJ Manuel will start in his place.
Watkins has missed each of the past two games because of a calf injury.
Receiver Percy Harvin has an injured hip and is questionable.
